https://tmrev.io/movie/694388-Classic Albums: Carly Simon - No Secrets 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/bR8wVaoXK2Lkjz8sVP5vLiTnIEA.jpg Carly Simon is one of the most influential singer-songwriters of her generation. The classic album that made her a global star was No Secrets, which included the enigmatic song You're So Vain. The album spent five weeks at number one in the US chart. Classic Albums: Carly Simon - No Secrets
